attributes.action: Abolish the eu flag in britain
attributes.background: As the 29th March 2019 is the original and true brexit date any/All EU flags should now be taken down and the only flag to flown except those of recognised countries with registered embassies be allowed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament isn't responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of the organisation who own the building or land.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government not to fly the EU flag on central government buildings if that's something you would like to see happen.
